name: The Night Circus
about: A magical competition between two young illusionists evolves into a deep love story.

name: Steve Jobs
about: The biography of Apple’s visionary co-founder, detailing his passion and perfectionism.

name: Thinking, Fast and Slow
about: An exploration of the dual systems that drive the way we think and make decisions.

name: The Book Thief
about: A young girl finds solace by stealing books and sharing them during Nazi Germany.

name: The Power of Habit
about: Examines the science behind habit creation and how habits can be changed.

name: The Alchemist
about: A shepherd’s journey in search of treasure reveals life’s deeper meaning.

name: Sapiens
about: A brief history of humankind from ancient times to the modern era.

name: Batman: Year One
about: A gritty reboot of Batman’s origin story focusing on his early days in Gotham.

name: Spider-Man: Blue
about: A nostalgic and heartfelt look at Peter Parker’s love for Gwen Stacy.

name: V for Vendetta
about: A dystopian tale of rebellion against a totalitarian government.
